actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend section 216(b) of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from Guam and the Virgin Islands to make nominations for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from Guam and the Virgin Islands to nominate two individuals each for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 216(b) of the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to entitle the Delegates in Congress from Guam and the Virgin Islands to make nominations for appointments to the Merchant Marine Academy.
